article.name: Account Settings Guide
article.title: Account Settings Guide
article.body:
In Account Settings, you can view your account’s subscription information, enable or disable specific features, and customize your KSAT console and Learner Experience (LX). To access your Account Settings, log in to your KSAT console and click your email address in the top-right corner of the page. Then, click Account Settings.

To navigate to the different sections of your Account Settings, click the section names on the left side of the page. To expand a section, click the arrow icon next to the section name or click Expand All to expand all sections. You can also use the search bar at the top-right corner of the page to search for keywords in your Account Settings.

After you update any settings, be sure to click the blue Save Changes button at the bottom of the page.

To learn more about the settings available in each section, see the list below:

  • Account Information Settings: In the Account Information section, you can review your subscription details, update your privacy settings, update your organization’s information, edit placeholders, and more. For more information, see our KnowBe4 Console Account Settings: Account Information article.
  • User Management Settings: In the User Provisioning section, you can edit your user provisioning settings. You have the ability to use Active Directory Integration (ADI) or SCIM to provision your users. For more information, see our KnowBe4 Console Account Settings: User Management article.
  • Phishing Settings: In the Phishing section, you can update your phishing campaign settings and enable Direct Message Injection (DMI). For more information, see our KnowBe4 Console Account Settings: Phishing article.
  • Training Settings: In the Training section, you can update your training and Learner Experience (LX) settings. For more information, see our KnowBe4 Console Account Settings: Training article.
  • Account Integrations Settings: In the Account Integrations section, you can manage your account integrations, including SAML, the Phish Alert Button (PAB), API reporting, PhishER, and, if you have a Diamond-level subscription, Second Chance. For more information, see our KnowBe4 Console Account Settings: Account Integrations article.
  • Reports Settings: In the Reports section, you can manage your reporting settings. For more information, see our KnowBe4 Console Account Settings: Reports article.

Account Settings Videos:

For detailed explanations of the different Account Settings sections, click the links below to access our Account Settings videos:

  • Video: Account Information Settings
  • Video: User Management Account Settings
  • Video: Phishing Account Settings
  • Video: Training Account Settings
  • Video: Account Integrations Settings

images.alt:
This image displays the **Account Settings** configuration page for a KnowBe4 product console.

**Context and Header:**
The page title is "Account Settings," accompanied by a gear icon. A search input labeled "Search by keyword..." is located in the top right corner.

**Navigation Panel (Left Column):**
The left panel serves as the primary navigation, listing major configuration categories.
*   The primary category, **Account Information**, is currently active (highlighted blue) and expanded (indicated by a down arrow).
*   Sub-sections displayed under Account Information include: "Purchased Products and Add-ons," "Account Privacy," "Organization Information," "Branding," and "Placeholders."
*   Collapsed, clickable major sections (indicated by right arrows) are: "User Management," "Phishing," "Training," "Account Integrations," and "Reports."
*   A link at the bottom allows the user to "Expand All."

**Main Content Area (Right Column):**
The content area displays the current configuration for the **Account Information** section.

1.  **Purchased Products and Add-ons:**
    *   **KnowBe4 Security Awareness Training** details: Subscription Level: Diamond; Subscription End Date: (No expiration); Number of Seats: 0; Active Users: 31.
    *   **PhishER** details: Subscription End Date: 10/09/2025.
    *   **Compliance Plus** details: Subscription End Date: 10/09/2025.

2.  **Account Privacy:**
    *   An informational banner (light blue background) indicates current agent access: "KnowBe4 agents can access your account until 01/07/2025, 3:09 AM".
    *   A configuration field labeled **"Allow KnowBe4 agents to access this account"** (including a help/tooltip icon) is present.
    *   This field is controlled by a dropdown menu currently set to the prompt: "Select option."
